name: Autumn Hike (Piesuprawny)
description:
Autumn Hike is a short 15-20 min walking simulator in which you explore beautiful autumn landscapes. Your goal is to get home from a cozy cabin in the woods but something strange may innterupt your plans.

Controls

Movement :  WASD

Interact :   E  or   left mouse button

Game by Wojciech Wesołowski and Łukasz Kosturek

Music Composer:

Łukasz Kosturek

https://soundcloud.com/lukasz-kosturek

If you come across any problems with running the game on your Mac, it probably means you need to give permissions. To do so:

  1. Open Terminal
  2. Type in “cd” and then the directory of the downloaded game. Then press enter. (for example: cd Downloads)
  3. Type in “chmod +x MacOS.app/Contents/MacOS/'AutumnHike' and press enter
  4. Turn off Terminal
  5. Click on the MacOS file while holding control on keyboard. Then choose “Open”. The system should prompt you that the software comes from an unknown developer (that’s us!). Tell your Mac to open it regardless. If nothing happens repeat Step 5 until the game opens. 

If you have any other questions, contact us!
